name: Sports
body:
### Sports.

Owners: Dylan and Leon

Hello! Welcome to our page about sports!

This page will be about what is the best sports equipments to buy.

  • Reviews on the products.

  • What is good for beginners.

  • What is a reasonable price if your either a beginner or advanced.

  • How to get started.

### Bikes background by Leon:

Hi, I'm Leon. I have been a competitive cyclist for about 3 years. I currently ride track bikes and own a Specialized Langster. I mainly ride fixed gear/track bikes because it is way more fun to ride then just a normal freewheel bike. On this page I will tell you what is a fixed gear/track bike and tell you what to buy to get you to start riding.

### Baseball background by Dylan:

Hi, I'm Dylan. I have been playing baseball for about 6 years. I currently play for the Galileo Lions. I mainly use Wilson Baseball Gloves, and Easton Bats. I play second base, third base, and shortstop. On this page, I will tell you about what good some good products are and how to play.

### Where we get our equipment from: Bikes: [City Grounds] (http://www.citygrounds.com/ "City Grounds") Baseball: [Baseball Express] (http://www.baseballexpress.com/ "Baseball Express") ### Support or Contact Contact us by: Facebook, E-mail, Instagram, or by Phone.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
